item.title: Bureaucrats’ Plot To Undermine Trump In 2020 Election Shows More People Need To Be Fired
item.description: If anything, Trump needs to scale up his efforts to clear out federal employees -- some of which worked in the lead-up to the 2020 election to undermi...

item.title: Bondi Quickly Moves To Restore Integrity, Accountability In Justice Department
item.description: A DOJ task force will review the conduct of prosecutors and staff over the last four years, a troubling time for justice in America.

item.title: Not Tired Of Losing, The Left Doubles Down On Standing Up For Insanity
item.description: As Democrats rally around government waste, illegal immigration and out-of-touch liberals, polls show Americans are with President Trump.

item.title: Next Time Nike Is Tempted To Run A Feminist Super Bowl Ad, Just Don’t Do It
item.description: Nike’s big celebration of women is actually demeaning.

item.title: Wheaton’s Cowardice In The Face Of Russ Vought Attacks Is Emblematic Of Its Leftward Lurch
item.description: It should not be controversial for Wheaton College to request prayer for alum Russ Vought as he takes a position in the Trump administration.
